response.original_title: ⭐ 1. Why Is Robinhood Holding My Withdrawal? Solutions
response.overview: Robinhood holds withdrawals due to trade settlement delays (stocks/options settle T+1, crypto takes blockchain confirmations),(+1☆(877)☆496☆4626) deposit verification (especially large or first-time ACH), security checks (unusual activity), or account restrictions (like pattern day trading), requiring funds to clear or documentation to be provided before release, often 1-7 business days.(+1☆(877)☆496☆4626) Check your app for alerts, ensure trades settled, verify bank details, and contact support if the delay is unusual. (+1☆(877)☆496☆4626)  Robinhood may delay withdrawals due to pending trades, bank deposit processing, or security checks.(+1☆(877)☆496☆4626) Trades usually settle in 1–2 days, and deposits take 3–5 days. Complete verification, cancel open orders, and use instant transfers to minimize delays.(+1☆(877)☆496☆4626)
